endpoints.description: Submit a new maintenance request for a property.
Retrieve the maintenance history of a specified property.
Update the details or status of a specific maintenance request.
Cancel an existing maintenance request by ID.
Register a new tenant into the system for a specific property.
Check for any outstanding payments for a particular tenant.
Submit a payment for an outstanding invoice.
Retrieve a list of approved vendors for maintenance services.
Check availability for scheduling a maintenance task.
Confirm a scheduled time slot for maintenance.
